545 I'm not gonna defend MTG on everything, but she is absolutely correct to demand that we stop the foreign grifts. Ukraine etc. posted 1 day ago by StopCorruptionDC 22 comments award share download report block
22 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save 2021Is1776 21 points 1 day ago cool now get her to stop corporate welfare AKA using illegals for labor. permalink award report block reply BlackJack1776 11 points 1 day ago She's in full damage control mode. "Lemme throw basic bitch MAGA red meat out out to the Base. Surely, somebody will simp for me. And, while they're calling each other retarded over it, my bullshit will simply fade away with the next news cycle.". -MTG permalink parent award report block reply TruculentGoose 15 points 1 day ago Yup... imagine hiring and employing illegals then still trying to claim MAGA... shes a joke permalink parent award report block reply Porkbut 4 points 1 day ago Grifting and pandering is so easy even a cavewoman can do it. permalink parent award report block reply 2021Is1776 1 points 1 day ago At this point if a girl is spouting Maga talking points I assume its a grift. Unless she can lay out the foundational principles of America first and admit the ones she violates I don't trust her. None of us are perfect I myself violate a few of our core tenants from time to time but I recognize those missteps and adjust accordingly. I myself am a contractor and have been for many years but you know what I've never done? used illegals even when it means working the project on my own. permalink parent award report block reply Corse46 1 points 23 hours ago Wasn't Trump the one that said the farmers can keep illegal workers as long as they haven't broken any other laws? Or was that MTG? permalink parent award report block reply dataonly 8 points 1 day ago You had me at... Europe is buying our stuff and giving it to them.
